Unlocks vGPU functionality for consumer Nvidia GPUs

Related repos

  • lets you unlock NVENC session limits and NvFBC on Nvidia consumer GPUs
  • cross-platform Rust graphics API for Vulkan, Metal, D3D12, OpenGL, WebGPU
  • open source video generation for low VRAM GPUs
  • Marketplace for exchange of compute resources
  • Hardware-accelerated GPU terminal emulator
  • CLI tool for managing GPUs across NVIDIA, AMD, Intel, and Apple Silicon systems
  • interactive GPU monitoring tool for Linux systems
  • interactive NVIDIA GPU process viewer
  • Monitors NVIDIA GPU metrics via web dashboard
